Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition: beep n.,v. Syn. {feep}. This term is techspeak under MS-DOS and OS/2, and seems to be generally preferred among micro hobbyists.

Dictionary.Name: Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)

Definition.WordDefinition: beep n : a short high tone produced as a signal or warning [syn: {bleep}] v 1: make a loud noise; "The horns of the taxis blared" [syn: {honk}, {blare}, {claxon}, {toot}] 2: call, summon, or alert with a beeper
